Sinopse: Amazon Obhijaan is an eternal saga of an explorer's quest for adventure starring Dev as the daredevil adventurer- Shankar Choudhury . This film will see Shankar traverse the length and breadth of South America, including the legendary Amazon in search of the mythical city of gold. It is a story of discovery and knowledge; unrelenting courage, survival, loss and pain.
